about_the_game:
What is the Farmer Pack?

Poly Plaza - Farmer Pack is unlock 3 new vehicles to be purchased in car dealers and 6 new clothes directly available in your inventory!

3 New vehicles

  • A 4*4 car

  • A delivery truck

  • A unique farmer car

New clothes (2 new outfits)

  • Legendary farmer shirt (+100% Max inventory weight)

  • Legendary farmer pants (+100% Luck)

  • Legendary farmer shoes (+50% Max inventory weight and +50% Luck)

  • Epic green shirt (+10% Revenues, +10% XP, +20% Luck, +20% Max inventory weight)

  • Rare tourist short (+5% Revenues, +5% XP, +5% Luck, +10% Max inventory weight)

  • Rare sandals (+5% Revenues, +5% XP, +5% Luck, +10% Max inventory weight)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100 / AMD Ryzen 3 2300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon™ RX 560 (4GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 11
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 3.6 GHz or higher: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X or Intel i5-8600K or newer
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 2060 6GB or AMD RX Vega 56 8GB or newer
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
